failed_checks.check_name: Ensure Amazon SageMaker model uses network isolation
code_block:
UDOPModel:
    Type: AWS::SageMaker::Model
    Properties:
      ExecutionRoleArn:
        Fn::GetAtt:
        - UDOPExecutionRole
        - Arn
      PrimaryContainer:
        Image:
          Fn::Sub: 763104351884.dkr.ecr.${AWS::Region}.amazonaws.com/pytorch-inference:2.1.0-gpu-py310
        ModelDataUrl:
          Ref: UDOPModelArtifactPath
        Environment:
          SAGEMAKER_PROGRAM: inference.py
          SAGEMAKER_SUBMIT_DIRECTORY: /opt/ml/model/code
          SAGEMAKER_CONTAINER_LOG_LEVEL: 20
          SAGEMAKER_REGION:
            Ref: AWS::Region
